lead_paragraph: The former Cowboys coach Dave Campo rejoined the staff Tuesday as the secondary coach. Campo was the only coach never to get Dallas into the playoffs — the Cowboys were 5-11 in each of his three seasons. He replaces Todd Bowles, one of several assistants who left to join the staff of the new Dolphins coach Tony Sparano, a former Cowboys assistant.
